As was pointed out by the hon. member for the city and county of St. John (Mr. Stockton), the legislature of New Brunswick is the only authority within the province of New Brunswick which can deal with the question of edu- cation. Quite so, and I pointed out I think in speaking on the second reading of this Bill that possibly that very circumstance, that very provision of the British North America Act, has de- terred the legislatures of those provinces from enacting legislation conferring rights by law upon minorities which they other- wisewould have enacted.
